desc: calculates the factorial of an integer
code: public int factorial (int n) { if (n == 1) { return 1; } return n * factorial (n - 1); }

desc: tests whether a given value is present in a list
code: public boolean contains ( int [ ] numbers, int target ) { for ( int number: numbers ) { if  (number == target ) { return true; } } return false; }
int add (int [] numbers) { int total = 0; for ( int number: numbers ) { total += number; } return total; }
